channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Budget airline begins deportation flights for ICE with start of Arizona operations
item.description: A U.S. budget airline has begun making deportation flights out of an Arizona airport, an unusual and controversial move for a company that depends heavily on its consumer brand.
